item.title: Error in my ice barrage
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

[quote=“madgamer, post:3, topic:171951”]put it as

castOnPlayer.snare();

since castonplayer refers to the attacked player.[/quote]

Lol just remove it because his server doesn’t support that.

item.title: Error in my ice barrage
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

put it as

castOnPlayer.snare();

since castonplayer refers to the attacked player.

item.title: Error in my ice barrage
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

rofl i was editing my ice barrage for it bind and for it require runes and i got this error:

i got this on my ice barrage :

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 93) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("Yuo don't have runes...type ::ib for the runes =)"); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30); castOnPlayersnare(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); actionTimer = 10; stillgfx(370, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(370, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("An ice barrage has casted in you"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 2); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) {

Read full topic
